question: What sort of development requests can I make?
answer:
We handle all sorts of requests including but not limited to:
  • Building new shopify stores
  • Building new features for your existing shopify store (such as adding product review functionality, etc)
  • Optimizing the speed of your store
  • Bug fixes, installing apps, etc.
>We do have a few exceptions though, we do NOT offer the following:
  • Advertising (for example, setting up ads for your store)
  • Customer Support for your customers
If you are not sure, don't hesitate to reach out to us.
